name: WebTribes
overview:
WebTribes Inc. is a network of online community support websites for people who suffer from life-consuming ailments such as Addiction, Anxiety, Depression, OCD, and HIV/Aids. At WebTribes, we believe that individuals become empowered to help themselves and others when they feel a part of something larger. Our user-friendly websites offer a convenient and safe place for individuals with similar challenges to connect, and share.

Also from WebTribes is our therapist directory, TherapyTribe.com. TherapyTribe, the only therapist directory integrated with the largest network of mental health support communities on the web. Using geo-targeting we connect therapist directly where patients hang-out online.
